DOC.brief_summary: Patients acute exacerbation chronic headache disorder present frequently Emergency Department ( ED ) pain management . A novel etiology headache Vertical Heterophoria ( VH ) , poorly understood little recognize binocular vision malady treat realign prismatic spectacle lenses result mark reduction headache associate VH symptom . This study aim determine accuracy Vertical Heterophoria Symptom Questionnaire ( VHSQ ) identify ED headache patient experience significant reduction VH symptom use realign prismatic spectacle lens . This study 's secondary purpose determine VH common cause chronic headache disorder ED headache patient . To achieve goal , prospective observational study perform ED headache patient > 18 year old . All give VHSQ , assess diagnosis VH optometrist utilize novel VH test method . High low score group VHSQ compare determine prevalence VH .
DOC.brief_title: Utility Survey Instrument Predict Benefit From Novel Treatment Vertical Heterophoria
DOC.criteria: Initially include patient present Emergency Department chief complaint Headache , Head Pain , Face Pain and/or Migraine . Greater equal 18 year old Ability speak read English Chronic headache disorder define physician diagnosis , great three month headache require symptom relief medication every two week , headache severe previous Emergency Department evaluation treatment necessary Symptoms directly cause trauma within last three month Known TMJ disorder present TMJ pain Suspected infectious sinusitis meningitis Pain originate ear Pain originate dental source Patient willing able travel study optometrist followup Known history cerebral aneurysm Known history brain tumor Without previous CT , MRI , image assess patient 's headache disorder Patient prisoner Patient temporary permanent custodianship Patient currently questionable state mental competence Treating physician study investigator believe patient inappropriate study participation
